citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on
5/8/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone and email. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 
5/8/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the registrant by phone and email. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
